p:
The symbols on the model parameters show the various impact of each parameter in the overall derived equation, either an increase or decrease of the model parameter. Thus it’s expressed as;
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ Mean\ effect=\frac{\beta_j{\sum}_i^n{D}_j}{\sum m\left({\beta}_j{\sum}_i^n{D}_j\right)} $$\end{document}
Mean effect =
β j
∑ i n
D j
∑ m
β j
∑ i n
D j
